execution_plan.description: Find order_ids that have more than 1 item (orders with item count > 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id FROM Order_Items GROUP BY order_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve orders' IDs and their placement dates for orders placed at the earliest date or that have more than 1 item (using order_ids from step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id, date_order_placed FROM Orders WHERE date_order_placed = (SELECT MIN(date_order_placed) FROM Orders) OR order_id IN ($step1.order_id);
